page.title: Maxim Dives 61 Pct on Drug Trial Result
page.text: PHILADELPHIA (Reuters) - Maxim Pharmaceuticals Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=MAXM.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">MAXM.O</A> said a trial to confirm the benefit of its Ceplene drug failed to show an improvement in survival rates for patients with liver cancer, sending its shares plunging on Monday.
